column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A British tourist has died at the Riverside Backpackers
column12: December 18 2019 at 12 noon.------Police say LEWIS JORDAN DAVIES was a 26-year-old British male.------As a result of information collected and the examination
column13: authorities confirmed that the death was from a heart attack may have been caused by epilepsy/a seizure.------ The body was taken to Stung Meanchey pagoda.
